Quote.Author: Jean de la Bruyere
Quote.QuoteValue: Grief at the absence of a loved one is happiness compared to life with a person one hates

Quote.Author: Jean de la Bruyere
Quote.QuoteValue: The first day one is a guest, the second a burden, and the third a pest

Quote.Author: Jean de la Bruyere
Quote.QuoteValue: All men's misfortunes spring from their hatred of being alone

Quote.Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer

Quote.Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship is the shadow of the evening, which increases with the setting sun of life

Quote.Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: A person often meets his destiny on the road he took to avoid it

Quote.Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Sadness flies away on the wings of time

Quote.Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Beware, so long as you live, of judging men by their outward appearance

Quote.Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: In short, Luck's always to blame

Quote.Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Patience and time do more than strength or passion

Quote.Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone believes very easily whatever they fear or desire

Quote.Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: The strongest passion is fear

Quote.Author: Jean de La Fontaine
Quote.QuoteValue: Dressed in the lion's skin, the ass spread terror far and wide

Quote.Author: Jean Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: The more sand that has escaped from the hourglass of our life, the clearer we should see through it

Quote.Author: Jean Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is moonlight in the gloomy night of life

Quote.Author: Jean Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Our birthdays are feathers in the broad wing of time

Quote.Author: Jean Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Every friend is to the other a sun, and a sunflower also. He attracts and follows

Quote.Author: Jean Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: What makes old age so sad is not that our joys but our hopes cease

Quote.Author: Jean Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Every man has a rainy corner of his life whence comes foul weather which follows him

Quote.Author: Jean Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not wait for extraordinary circumstances to do good action; try to use ordinary situations

Quote.Author: Jean Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Be great in act, as you have been in thought

Quote.Author: Jean Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: You prove your worth with your actions, not with your mouth

Quote.Author: Jean Paul
Quote.QuoteValue: Joy descends gently upon us like the evening dew, and does not patter down like a hailstorm

Quote.Author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
Quote.QuoteValue: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet

Quote.Author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
Quote.QuoteValue: Absolute silence leads to sadness. It is the image of death

Quote.Author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
Quote.QuoteValue: A feeble body weakens the mind

Quote.Author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
Quote.QuoteValue: Man was born free, and he is everywhere in chains

Quote.Author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever blushes is already guilty; true innocence is ashamed of nothing

Quote.Author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
Quote.QuoteValue: No man has any natural authority over his fellow men

Quote.Author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
Quote.QuoteValue: I may be no better, but at least I am different

Quote.Author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
Quote.QuoteValue: The English think they are free. They are free only during the election of members of parliament

Quote.Author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
Quote.QuoteValue: You forget that the fruits belong to all and that the land belongs to no one

Quote.Author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau
Quote.QuoteValue: Every man has a right to risk his own life for the preservation of it

Quote.Author: Jean-Michel Basquiat
Quote.QuoteValue: I start a picture and I finish it

Quote.Author: Jean-Michel Basquiat
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to be a star, not a gallery mascot

Quote.Author: Jean-Michel Basquiat
Quote.QuoteValue: Some days I can't get an idea, and I think, 'Man, I'm just washed up,' but it's just a mood

Quote.Author: Jean-Michel Basquiat
Quote.QuoteValue: The country makes me more paranoid, you know? I think the crazy people out there are little crazier

Quote.Author: Jean-Michel Basquiat
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a real person. I'm a legend

Quote.Author: Jean-Michel Basquiat
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think about art when I'm working. I try to think about life

Quote.Author: Jean-Michel Basquiat
Quote.QuoteValue: Occasionally, when I get mad at a woman, I'll do some great, awful painting about her

Quote.Author: Jean-Michel Basquiat
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a black artist, I am an artist

Quote.Author: Jean-Michel Basquiat
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to make paintings that look as if they were made by a child

Quote.Author: Jean-Michel Basquiat
Quote.QuoteValue: The more I paint the more I like everything

Quote.Author: Jean-Paul Sartre
Quote.QuoteValue: Only the guy who isn't rowing has time to rock the boat

Quote.Author: Jean-Paul Sartre
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom is what you do with what's been done to you

Quote.Author: Jean-Paul Sartre
Quote.QuoteValue: Commitment is an act, not a word

Quote.Author: Jean-Paul Sartre
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are lonely when you're alone, you are in bad company

Quote.Author: Jean-Paul Sartre
Quote.QuoteValue: When rich people fight wars with one another, poor people are the ones to die

Quote.Author: Jean-Paul Sartre
Quote.QuoteValue: Being is. Being is in-itself. Being is what it is

Quote.Author: Jean-Paul Sartre
Quote.QuoteValue: Words are loaded pistols

Quote.Author: Jean-Paul Sartre
Quote.QuoteValue: A lost battle is a battle one thinks one has lost

Quote.Author: Jean-Paul Sartre
Quote.QuoteValue: Life begins on the other side of despair

Quote.Author: Jean-Paul Sartre
Quote.QuoteValue: We must act out passion before we can feel it

Quote.Author: Jeff Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really need to be remembered. I hope the music's remembered

Quote.Author: Jeff Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: Kiss me out of desire, but not consolation

Quote.Author: Jeff Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: All flowers in time bend towards the sun, I know you say there's no one for you, But here is one

Quote.Author: Jeff Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: To young to hold on and to old to just break free and run

Quote.Author: Jeff Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: She's a tear that hangs inside my soul forever

Quote.Author: Jeff Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: Thinking so hard on her soft eyes and memories of the signs that it's over. It's over

Quote.Author: Jeff Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to be a guy with a guitar

Quote.Author: Jeff Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: A tune has to resonate with whatever is happening around it

Quote.Author: Jeff Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: When I sing, my face changes shape. It feels like my skull changes shape... the bones bend

Quote.Author: Jeff Buckley
Quote.QuoteValue: Certain emotions just take you to the notes - being furious, heroic, sad, erotic, when rain comes

Quote.Author: Jeff Foxworthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Did you know babies are nauseated by the smell of a clean shirt?

Quote.Author: Jeff Foxworthy
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the great thing about a tractor. You can't really hear the phone ring

Quote.Author: Jeff Foxworthy
Quote.QuoteValue: If you own a home with wheels on it and several cars without, you just might be a redneck

Quote.Author: Jeff Foxworthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never been jealous. Not even when my dad finished fifth grade a year before I did

Quote.Author: Jeff Foxworthy
Quote.QuoteValue: You may be a redneck if... you have spent more on your pickup truck than on your education

Quote.Author: Jeff Foxworthy
Quote.QuoteValue: You may be a redneck if... your lifetime goal is to own a fireworks stand

Quote.Author: Jeff Foxworthy
Quote.QuoteValue: You moon the wrong person at an office party and suddenly you're not 'professional' any more

Quote.Author: Jeff Foxworthy
Quote.QuoteValue: If you've ever made change in the offering plate, you might be a redneck

Quote.Author: Jeff Foxworthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I know God is real

Quote.Author: Jeff Foxworthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I know if mama ain't happy, ain't nobody happy

Quote.Author: Jeff Sessions
Quote.QuoteValue: You pay a price when you have an objective sentencing system. That is, nothing is perfect

Quote.Author: Jeff Sessions
Quote.QuoteValue: I certainly believe that improving our intelligence is of important national interest

Quote.Author: Jeff Sessions
Quote.QuoteValue: We can't do everything with a budget, but we can put the country on much sounder financial footing

Quote.Author: Jeff Sessions
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big fan of the DEA

Quote.Author: Jeff Sessions
Quote.QuoteValue: Donors don't win elections; voters win elections

Quote.Author: Jeff Sessions
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day, lax sentencing costs lives

Quote.Author: Jeff Sessions
Quote.QuoteValue: I am pleased to endorse Donald Trump for the presidency of the United States

Quote.Author: Jeff Sessions
Quote.QuoteValue: Hybart is a little community I grew up in, so it was just a wonderful time in those years

Quote.Author: Jeff Sessions
Quote.QuoteValue: Legal immigration is the primary source of low-wage immigration into the United States

Quote.Author: Jeff Sessions
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have a constitutional right or a moral right to demand entry into any country

Quote.Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote.QuoteValue: Life can be dramatic and funny all in the same day

Quote.Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote.QuoteValue: My best hostess tip is to have good food and really good music!

Quote.Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote.QuoteValue: I spent my first paycheck on a vintage Mercedes

Quote.Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to read about what my love life is really like

Quote.Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote.QuoteValue: True love brings up everything - you're allowing a mirror to be held up to you daily

Quote.Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no regrets in life, just lessons

Quote.Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh, it's not really gambling when you never lose

Quote.Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote.QuoteValue: The best smell in the world is that man that you love

Quote.Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote.QuoteValue: I always say don't make plans, make options

Quote.Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote.QuoteValue: I am trying to think of the last time that I just said, 'What the hell!' and did something crazy

Quote.Author: Jennifer Lopez
Quote.QuoteValue: Women should never go without earrings. Passing on them is an opportunity missed

Quote.Author: Jennifer Lopez
Quote.QuoteValue: Doubt is a killer. You just have to know who you are and what you stand for

Quote.Author: Jennifer Lopez
Quote.QuoteValue: You mirror what the world mirrors to you

Quote.Author: Jennifer Lopez
Quote.QuoteValue: You get what you give. What you put into things is what you get out of them

Quote.Author: Jennifer Lopez
Quote.QuoteValue: I have the stardom glow

Quote.Author: Jennifer Lopez
Quote.QuoteValue: I could serve coffee using my rear as a ledge

Quote.Author: Jennifer Lopez
Quote.QuoteValue: And I love the idea of spending the whole day in bed with my lover

Quote.Author: Jennifer Lopez
Quote.QuoteValue: And I deal with all that by being like a perfectionist. But that's okay

Quote.Author: Jennifer Lopez
Quote.QuoteValue: They're making me out to be a serial marrying person or something. I'm laughing at that

Quote.Author: Jennifer Lopez
Quote.QuoteValue: I judge people on how they smell, not how they look

Quote.Author: Jeremy Bentham
Quote.QuoteValue: The power of the lawyer is in the uncertainty of the law

Quote.Author: Jeremy Bentham
Quote.QuoteValue: Stretching his hand up to reach the stars, too often man forgets the flowers at his feet

Quote.Author: Jeremy Bentham
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the greatest good to the greatest number of people which is the measure of right and wrong

Quote.Author: Jeremy Bentham
Quote.QuoteValue: Lawyers are the only persons in whom ignorance of the law is not punished

Quote.Author: Jeremy Bentham
Quote.QuoteValue: The question is not, 'Can they reason?' nor, 'Can they talk?' but rather, 'Can they suffer?'

Quote.Author: Jeremy Bentham
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest happiness of the greatest number is the foundation of morals and legislation

Quote.Author: Jeremy Bentham
Quote.QuoteValue: All punishment is mischief; all punishment in itself is evil

Quote.Author: Jeremy Bentham
Quote.QuoteValue: Every law is an infraction of liberty

Quote.Author: Jeremy Bentham
Quote.QuoteValue: Secrecy, being an instrument of conspiracy, ought never to be the system of a regular government

Quote.Author: Jeremy Bentham
Quote.QuoteValue: Tyranny and anarchy are never far apart

Quote.Author: Jeremy Corbyn
Quote.QuoteValue: We are not doing celebrity, personality, abusive politics - we are doing ideas. This is about hope

Quote.Author: Jeremy Corbyn
Quote.QuoteValue: I am just an ordinary person trying to do an ordinary job

Quote.Author: Jeremy Corbyn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a leader, not a dictator. I want to persuade people rather than threaten or control them

Quote.Author: Jeremy Corbyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is life. Some of the wisest people you meet are sweeping our streets

Quote.Author: Jeremy Corbyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Inequality is a terrible waste of time, a waste of people's resources

Quote.Author: Jeremy Corbyn
Quote.QuoteValue: What I find appalling is the intrusive nature towards my extended family

Quote.Author: Jeremy Corbyn
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in a very unequal society

Quote.Author: Jeremy Corbyn
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not joining in personal attacks... I don't do personal attacks

Quote.Author: Jeremy Corbyn
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got lots of stamina; don't worry about that. I cycle every day - it's OK

Quote.Author: Jeremy Corbyn
Quote.QuoteValue: Sure, I've met with people I don't agree with

Quote.Author: Jerry Della Femina
Quote.QuoteValue: I honestly believe that advertising is the most fun you can have with your clothes on

Quote.Author: Jerry Della Femina
Quote.QuoteValue: Thank you for making me nouveau riche

Quote.Author: Jerry Della Femina
Quote.QuoteValue: Advertising should always be in good taste without a question

Quote.Author: Jerry Della Femina
Quote.QuoteValue: Probably the best advertising jobs of all are done by governments to convince people to go to war

Quote.Author: Jerry Della Femina
Quote.QuoteValue: Kids don't know what life was like without cell phones

Quote.Author: Jerry Della Femina
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a temporary amusement

Quote.Author: Jerry Della Femina
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never met a client who wants to be the worst

Quote.Author: Jerry Della Femina
Quote.QuoteValue: Almost everything looks better from a distance, Long Island included

Quote.Author: Jerry Della Femina
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't generally like advertising that takes a stand

Quote.Author: Jerry Della Femina
Quote.QuoteValue: There are no client conflicts, only bad explanations

Quote.Author: Jerry Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: Constantly choosing the lesser of two evils is still choosing evil

Quote.Author: Jerry Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: America is still mostly xenophobic and racist. That's the nature of America, I think

Quote.Author: Jerry Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: Stuff that's hidden and murky and ambiguous is scary because you don't know what it does

Quote.Author: Jerry Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm shopping around for something to do that no one will like

Quote.Author: Jerry Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: And as far as I'm concerned, it's like I say, drugs are not the problem. Other stuff is the problem

Quote.Author: Jerry Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: And for me there's still more material than 20 lifetimes that I can use up

Quote.Author: Jerry Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: I mean, whatever kills you kills you, and your death is authentic no matter how you die

Quote.Author: Jerry Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: Our strong suit is what we do, and our audience

Quote.Author: Jerry Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: So we are pretty convinced we don't want to play huge stadiums unless we can play them well

Quote.Author: Jerry Garcia
Quote.QuoteValue: What we do is as American as lynch mobs. America has always been a complex place

Quote.Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Pay attention, don't let life go by you. Fall in love with the back of your cereal box

Quote.Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the true spirit of Christmas; people being helped by people other than me

Quote.Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's funny to be delicate with subjects that are explosive

Quote.Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: You can be passionate about anything

Quote.Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, if life boils down to one thing, it's movement. To live is to keep moving

Quote.Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to motivate yourself with challenges. That's how you know you're still alive

Quote.Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: People who read the tabloids deserve to be lied to

Quote.Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you start doing only what you've already proven you can do, you're on the road to death

Quote.Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: A bookstore is one of the only pieces of evidence we have that people are still thinking

Quote.Author: Jerry Seinfeld
Quote.QuoteValue: The IRS! They're like the Mafia, they can take anything they want!

Quote.Author: Jerry West
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Gemini. Know what that means? There are two very different sides to me

Quote.Author: Jerry West
Quote.QuoteValue: Confidence is a lot of this game or any game. If you don't think you can, you won't

Quote.Author: Jerry West
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't get much done in life if you only work on the days when you feel good

Quote.Author: Jerry West
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy winning, but more importantly, I enjoy the people I'm around

Quote.Author: Jerry West
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just ultracompetitive. I will be till they put me in the grave

Quote.Author: Jerry West
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm surprised when the ball doesn't go into the hoop. I think I should make every shot

Quote.Author: Jerry West
Quote.QuoteValue: In the playoffs, the best players are supposed to play better. I did. It made no difference

Quote.Author: Jerry West
Quote.QuoteValue: You need lofty goals. Then cement it with a great work ethic

Quote.Author: Jerry West
Quote.QuoteValue: Fear of failure, it's the greatest motivational tool. It drives me and drives me and drives me

Quote.Author: Jerry West
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't want to win, you don't want to be around me

Quote.Author: Jesse Ventura
Quote.QuoteValue: Congratulations, you have a sense of humor. And to those who didn't: Go stick your head in the mud

Quote.Author: Jesse Ventura
Quote.QuoteValue: Wrestling is ballet with violence

Quote.Author: Jesse Ventura
Quote.QuoteValue: A crime is a crime, regardless of what collar you wear

Quote.Author: Jesse Ventura
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't legislate morality

Quote.Author: Jesse Ventura
Quote.QuoteValue: If you were to come to Minnesota, I could have you locked up like that. That's power

Quote.Author: Jesse Ventura
Quote.QuoteValue: There is much more to being a patriot and a citizen than reciting the pledge or raising a flag

Quote.Author: Jesse Ventura
Quote.QuoteValue: Win if you can, lose if you must, but always cheat

Quote.Author: Jesse Ventura
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't legislate against stupidity

Quote.Author: Jesse Ventura
Quote.QuoteValue: It seems that elections today are more popularity than they are substantial issues

Quote.Author: Jesse Ventura
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm saying that there's way more to 9/11 than mainstream media and our government have told us

Quote.Author: Jessica Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: All I have to say is: Jessica Simpson is the most beautiful woman on the planet!

Quote.Author: Jessica Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to be comfortable, but I also love to play up the glamour

Quote.Author: Jessica Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't ever really feel that wearing my wedding ring is what determines me being married or not

Quote.Author: Jessica Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think anything sounds good with a Southern accent

Quote.Author: Jessica Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing worse than being disappointed in somebody

Quote.Author: Jessica Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: Is this chicken, what I have, or is this fish? I know it's tuna, but it says 'Chicken of the Sea.'

Quote.Author: Jessica Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to look like Daisy Duke every day. I don't want to wear a bathing suit every day

Quote.Author: Jessica Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a naughty sweetheart

Quote.Author: Jessica Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: Is that weird, taking my Louis Vuitton bag camping?

Quote.Author: Jessica Simpson
Quote.QuoteValue: I have to go... drop some kids in the pool

Quote.Author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
Quote.QuoteValue: It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society

Quote.Author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
Quote.QuoteValue: The constant assertion of belief is an indication of fear

Quote.Author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
Quote.QuoteValue: We all want to be famous people, and the moment we want to be something we are no longer free

Quote.Author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
Quote.QuoteValue: One is never afraid of the unknown; one is afraid of the known coming to an end

Quote.Author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
Quote.QuoteValue: Religion is the frozen thought of man out of which they build temples

Quote.Author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
Quote.QuoteValue: Tradition becomes our security, and when the mind is secure it is in decay

Quote.Author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth is a pathless land

Quote.Author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
Quote.QuoteValue: When I understand myself, I understand you, and out of that understanding comes love

Quote.Author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
Quote.QuoteValue: With increasing age, dullness of mind and heart sets in

Quote.Author: Jiddu Krishnamurti
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom from the desire for an answer is essential to the understanding of a problem

Quote.Author: Jill Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, hair is an accoutrement. Hair is jewelry. It's an accessory

Quote.Author: Jill Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: My grill is intended to be discreet. It's there because I enjoy jewelry

Quote.Author: Jill Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: To be a queen of a household is a powerful thing

Quote.Author: Jill Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I need to find creative diversity because if I get stuck, I get unhappy

Quote.Author: Jill Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be humble when you're dealing with God

Quote.Author: Jill Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can't help me grow, there's no point with you being in my life

Quote.Author: Jill Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: African people worldwide are known to be welcoming and open-minded

Quote.Author: Jill Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned that friendship does not equate business, business does not equate friendship

Quote.Author: Jill Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: God is ever present. He's in every breath, in every step. He's here, always, always

Quote.Author: Jill Scott
Quote.QuoteValue: I love foods that start in my cheeks and then vibrate up

Quote.Author: Jillian Michaels
Quote.QuoteValue: Life has a way of working out the way it's meant to

Quote.Author: Jillian Michaels
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you've got to make your work and workouts co-exist

Quote.Author: Jillian Michaels
Quote.QuoteValue: My agenda is trying to help people live a better life

Quote.Author: Jillian Michaels
Quote.QuoteValue: Parenting is not for sissies. You have to sacrifice and grow up

Quote.Author: Jillian Michaels
Quote.QuoteValue: I only eat healthy food, and I only want healthy love!

Quote.Author: Jillian Michaels
Quote.QuoteValue: It's impossible to put yourself first when you're a mom

Quote.Author: Jillian Michaels
Quote.QuoteValue: I was homophobic because I obviously didn't know that I was gay

Quote.Author: Jillian Michaels
Quote.QuoteValue: It's important in life to celebrate any victory in life

Quote.Author: Jillian Michaels
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to get into the best shape of my life for 40

Quote.Author: Jillian Michaels
Quote.QuoteValue: I change the workout every month, so you never adapt and never plateau

Quote.Author: Jim Carrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Behind every great man is a woman rolling her eyes

Quote.Author: Jim Carrey
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of good love can happen in ten years

Quote.Author: Jim Carrey
Quote.QuoteValue: It is better to risk starving to death then surrender. If you give up on your dreams, what's left?

Quote.Author: Jim Carrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe other people will try to limit me but I don't limit myself

Quote.Author: Jim Carrey
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very serious about no alcohol, no drugs. Life is too beautiful

Quote.Author: Jim Carrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Ya know what I do almost every day? I wash. Personal hygiene is part of the package with me

Quote.Author: Jim Carrey
Quote.QuoteValue: My focus is to forget the pain of life. Forget the pain, mock the pain, reduce it. And laugh

Quote.Author: Jim Carrey
Quote.QuoteValue: Life opens up opportunities to you, and you either take them or you stay afraid of taking them

Quote.Author: Jim Carrey
Quote.QuoteValue: If you've got a talent, protect it

Quote.Author: Jim Carrey
Quote.QuoteValue: My upbringing in Canada made me the person I am. I will always be proud to be a Canadian

Quote.Author: Jim Gaffigan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a comedian, which is the opposite of a lifestyle that equips you to be a parent

Quote.Author: Jim Gaffigan
Quote.QuoteValue: I always imagine that if I met Dr. Seuss, he would be very similar to Crispin Glover

Quote.Author: Jim Gaffigan
Quote.QuoteValue: You know what it's like having five kids? Imagine you're drowning. And someone hands you a baby

Quote.Author: Jim Gaffigan
Quote.QuoteValue: Ever read a book that changed your life? Me neither

Quote.Author: Jim Gaffigan
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something that's really fun about the challenge of making the mundane funny, too, I think

Quote.Author: Jim Gaffigan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm closer to Bob Newhart than Rodney Dangerfield

Quote.Author: Jim Gaffigan
Quote.QuoteValue: Most single guys I know think fatherhood is terrifying

Quote.Author: Jim Gaffigan
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to only eat animals that are vegan. I'm probably the opposite of a vegan

Quote.Author: Jim Gaffigan
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to be known as funny

Quote.Author: Jim Gaffigan
Quote.QuoteValue: There's something about being a parent that has, I think, made me a better comedian

Quote.Author: Jim Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't be unhappy in the middle of a big, beautiful river

Quote.Author: Jim Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: We pretend that the brain is binary, like a computer. But it's not. It's completely holographic

Quote.Author: Jim Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody has a gun in their car in Detroit

Quote.Author: Jim Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: We are all naturally xenophobic

Quote.Author: Jim Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know what psychotherapy does. I have been seeing the same person for 26 years now

Quote.Author: Jim Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: Short things are short all over and long things are long all over

Quote.Author: Jim Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: Naturally we would prefer seven epiphanies a day and an earth not so apparently devoid of angels

Quote.Author: Jim Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: Because most writers have totally unrealistic concepts of how publishing works

Quote.Author: Jim Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: I write novellas because I don't like loose sprawling prose

Quote.Author: Jim Harrison
Quote.QuoteValue: New Yorkers are mostly interested in New York - in case you haven't noticed

Quote.Author: Jim Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself

Quote.Author: Jim Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: There are things known and things unknown and in between are the doors

Quote.Author: Jim Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: Where's your will to be weird?

Quote.Author: Jim Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of the worst mistakes of my life have been haircuts

Quote.Author: Jim Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: I like people who shake other people up and make them feel uncomfortable

Quote.Author: Jim Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: Hatred is a very underestimated emotion

Quote.Author: Jim Morrison
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever controls the media, controls the mind
